posts.postText: DUDE, WHERE THE HELL DID YOU GO, WHAT HAPPENED?
took a sweet vacation to new york

Dudeeeeeeeeeeeeeee, why didn't you like tell anyone of us lol? You just up''n left! 

Anyway dude, welcome back man, glad to see you!
Dude we thought you died. We already sent your all your points to your next of kin and everything.
welcome back LJ. I hope your trip to New York was a good one.
Ive misse kniving you lj :3 welcome back!
LJ, every day that you were gone, I sat there looking at my friends list just waiting for my sweet LJ to come back. I missed you <3
I missed you more than everyone above me and below me put together.

>> I missed you more than everyone above me and below me put together. 
Whut he saed.

>> Dude we thought you died. We already sent your all your points to your next of kin and everything. 

see lol I told you.
you came back, but you are still never on! what is with that?!?!
